name: Mysterious Bolognese
effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.
description: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aurora, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?
source: Lisa's specialty dish from cooking Flaming Red Bolognese.
